actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: To authorize the Gandhi-King Scholarly Exchange Initiative focusing on peace and nonviolence in global conflict resolution, and for other purposes.
short_title: Gandhi-King Scholarly Exchange Initiative Act of 2013

summary.text: Gandhi-King Scholarly Exchange Initiative Act of 2013 - Authorizes the Secretary of State to carry out, in cooperation with the government of India, the Gandhi-King Scholarly Exchange Initiative comprised of educational, scholarly, and professional exchange programs.

titles.title: Gandhi-King Scholarly Exchange Initiative Act of 2013
To authorize the Gandhi-King Scholarly Exchange Initiative focusing on peace and nonviolence in global conflict resolution, and for other purposes.
